languages.text: "Нет. К моему великому сожалению. Возможно, теперь мне самому нужно проявить инициативу". {n}Маражай ухмыляется собственным мыслям.{/n}
"They have not. To my deepest regret. Perhaps it is I who should try to show some initiative now." {n}Marazhai smirks at his unvoiced thoughts.{/n}

languages.text: «Pues no, muy a mi pesar. Tal vez va siendo hora de que yo muestre algo de iniciativa». {n}Marazhai sonríe ante lo que deja sin decir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have not. To my deepest regret. Perhaps it is I who should try to show some initiative now." {n}Marazhai smirks at his unvoiced thoughts.{/n}

languages.text: “没有，这实在是太让人遗憾了。或许我应该主动些才是。”{n}玛拉斋话里有话，得意洋洋地笑着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have not. To my deepest regret. Perhaps it is I who should try to show some initiative now." {n}Marazhai smirks at his unvoiced thoughts.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「あいつらは違う。誠に遺憾だ。おそらく今、何らかの主導権を示すべきなのは俺の方だろう」{n}マラズハイは口にしない本心に、薄ら笑いを浮かべた{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have not. To my deepest regret. Perhaps it is I who should try to show some initiative now." {n}Marazhai smirks at his unvoiced thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あいつらは違う。誠に遺憾だ。おそらく今、何らかの主導権を示すべきなのは俺の方だろう」{n}マラズハイは口にしない本心に、薄ら笑いを浮かべた{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Non, et croyez bien que je le regrette. Peut-être est-ce à moi de prendre l'initiative, à présent. » {n}Marazhai sourit à la pensée des idées qui lui trottent dans la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have not. To my deepest regret. Perhaps it is I who should try to show some initiative now." {n}Marazhai smirks at his unvoiced thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non, et croyez bien que je le regrette. Peut-être est-ce à moi de prendre l'initiative, à présent. » {n}Marazhai sourit à la pensée des idées qui lui trottent dans la tête.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nein. Zu meinem größten Bedauern. Vielleicht sollte ich nun versuchen, ein wenig Initiative zu zeigen." {n}Marazhai grinst ob seiner unausgesprochenen Gedanken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They have not. To my deepest regret. Perhaps it is I who should try to show some initiative now." {n}Marazhai smirks at his unvoiced thoughts.{/n}

languages.text: "Üzülerek söylüyorum ki kalkışmadılar. Belki de inisiyatifi ele almam lazımdır." {n}Marazhai, içinden geçirdiklerine gülüyor.{/n}
